description: Definitive schema for all keys used in the Trusted Event Data Stream (TEDS), enabling strict type and format validation.

start_timestamp.description: The exact time the process initiated.

previous_hash.description: Cryptographic hash of the TEDS record immediately preceding this one.

csr_lock_hash.description: Hash derived from the CRoT State Register (CSR) lock.

environment_verification_status.description: Flag indicating successful pre-execution environment verification.

acvd_final_hash.description: Final cryptographic hash of the validated Assessment & Validation Cycle Definition (ACVD) package.

str_hash.description: Hash of the persistent State Transition Record (STR) confirmed at persistence completion.
